text:
Making a custom workflow action. Looking at nodemailer for the email send. Need a way to add the HubSpot tracking pixel - this is the hard part. I know I can BCC for email logging, but the pixel isn't there so I can't track open, etc.

Need ideas!

From what I can remember, HubSpot doesnâ€™t have a IMG pixel solution for what you need. Where you could add an `<img>` tag to the HTML email part and track opens.

Google Analytics had this but it was buried in their documentation.
<@U04T2CUCP8T> you best solution would be to use Transactional Email API for this.
<@U03REFNRMB3> thank you, the challenge is we don't want users to need to purchase the Transactional Email addon for 600 p/m just to use our application
<@U04T2CUCP8T> have you tried to reverse engineer the HubSpot Chrome extension that adds the pixel to Gmail emails?
